title: Just no Riot.
body:
Somehow riot, even when i get a report saying a good thing from you guys... it makes me more cynical about whether you guys do shit.

So basically i have logged in for the first time in about 2 weeks, and i haven't played a game for a month.

Now that i'm on, i have gotten the pop up saying "someone you reported has been punished"

So why the fuck did it take upwards of at least 2 weeks for this guy to receive said punishment?

And yes i KNOW it has to have taken this long, because it has to have been for a game i played a month ago, but i didn't receive this notification when i logged in sometime 2 weeks ago.

replies.body: Because you may have been the first person to report them, starting their 3 week trial, and they got reported enough to be punished in those 3 weeks, and because you reported them you were notified of it, sometime during the time you werent playing, and it only showed as you only just logged in

Typically the notification wouldn't show up if that was the case, but they are notoriously....janky. They're working on it promise....

As for why he'd get such a late notification, it's possible it was a straight up bug with the notification, could have been the timing of his login, maybe he logged in but didn't play a game so it didn't refresh those notifications, or maybe it was a case that was manually reviewed (though I don't think those generate these notifications). Really I don't know, but the few times I've gotten these notifications it's always pretty much straight after the game (it's called the IFS for a reason).

I've never actually heard of anyone getting a notification that late, so most likely it was either for someone else he reported and didn't remember, or it was just a strange bug or interaction of some sort.

more likely than not you had them when their report capacity filled and they got a ban, your reports are saved for ~3 weeks and if someone within that 3 week period was banned which you reported, you get notified. It could just be they were notified, but because they didn't log in they never viewed the message, so it would have the appearance of a longer time frame.
Yeah I suspect him not seeing it had something to do with him being inactive for so long. But it's not exactly a reliable notification on a good day so it could just about be anything tbh.

at least you got 1. i've reported countless people and never received any indication that any of them have been punished. i only report extreme behaviour like CONSTANT flaming or int feeding, yet i received an instant 2 week ban on this account after using a certain word  in a particular game.

the priority in the system seems to be a little flawed, at least from my personal experience.
